name: browseros-monorepo
description: BrowserOS monorepo - server, extension, and shared packages

scripts.dev:server: mkdir -p dist/server && bun build --compile apps/server/src/index.ts --outfile dist/server/browseros-server --minify --env inline
scripts.dev:ext: rimraf dist/ext && bun run --filter browseros-controller build:dev && mkdir -p dist/ext && cp -r apps/controller-ext/dist/* dist/ext/
scripts.dist:ext: rimraf dist/ext && mkdir -p dist/ext && bun run --filter browseros-controller build && cp -r apps/controller-ext/dist/* dist/ext/
scripts.test: bun run test:cleanup && bun --env-file=.env.dev test apps/server/tests/tools apps/server/tests/common
scripts.test:cdp: bun run test:cleanup && bun --env-file=.env.dev test apps/server/tests/tools/cdp-based
scripts.test:controller: bun run test:cleanup && bun --env-file=.env.dev test apps/server/tests/tools/controller-based
scripts.docs: npm run docs:generate && npm run format

author: BrowserOS
